alert.note: Alert for Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern New Castle and northwestern Salem Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pennsville, or 8 miles south of Wilmington, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Pennsville, Carneys Point, New Castle, Penns Grove, Salem, Delaware Memorial Bridge, Bellefonte and Edgemoor. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 15 and 16. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northern Delaware...and southern New Jersey.
